title: haridaasa giri
sahitya:
haridAsagiri satgurunAthanE

iRai gnAnam tanai nAda neRiyAl uNarttiya

(hari)

anupallavi

maRai nUlgaLum mahanIyarum uNarndu

paRai sARRiDum punida iRai nAma isai tanda

(hari)

caraNam

madamAtsaryAdi panca pAtakam nInga

nidamE parama gnAnAnandan pAdamE

idayam tanil paDittup pErinba nilai Onga

idam tandiDum ranjani nAdam tanil negizhndu  

madyama kAlam

anbartam cintai kavarndiDa pAmAri pozhindavanE

tanmayamAgit tanai uNarum sat bhagavata priya guruparanE

(hari)
